doc.name: Function reference
doc.briefdescription: A list of the available functions

subsection.name: uix.Panel
subsection.description: Arrange a single element inside a standard panel
subsection.p: Arrange a single element inside a standard panel

dl.dd: creates a standard uipanel object but with automatic management of the contained widget or layout. The properties available are largely the same as the builtin uipanel object. Where more than one child is added, the currently visible child is determined using the Selection property.
also sets one or more property values.

property.name: BackgroundColor
property.description: The color to use for exposed areas of the layout background. This can be an RGB triple (e.g. [0 0 1]) or a colour name (e.g. 'b').

property.name: BeingDeleted
property.description: is the object in the process of being deleted.

property.name: BorderType
property.value: [ none | etchedin | etchedout | beveledin | beveledout | line ]
property.description: Type of border around the uipanel area.

property.name: BorderWidth
property.description: Width of the panel border.

property.name: Children
property.description: List of child objects within this layout (note that this can only be set to permutations of itself).

property.name: DeleteFcn
property.description: Function to call when the layout is being deleted

property.name: FontAngle
property.description: Title font angle.

property.name: FontName
property.description: Title font name (e.g. Arial, Helvetica etc).

property.name: FontSize
property.description: Title font size.

property.name: FontUnits
property.description: Title font units for measuring size.

property.name: FontWeight
property.description: Title font weight.

property.name: ForegroundColor
property.description: Title font color and/or color of 2-D border line.

property.name: HighlightColor
property.description: 3-D frame highlight color.

property.name: Padding
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space around the outside of the layout.

property.name: Parent
property.description: The handle of the parent figure or container.

property.name: Position
property.description: The position (x,y) and size (w,h) of the layout.

property.name: Selection
property.description: Which child is visible.

property.name: ShadowColor
property.description: 3-D frame shadow color.

property.name: Tag
property.description: A string that can be used to identify this object later.

property.name: Title
property.description: Title string.

property.name: TitlePosition
property.value: [ lefttop | centertop | righttop | leftbottom | centerbottom | rightbottom ]
property.description: Location of title string in relation to the panel.

property.name: Type
property.description: the object type (class).

property.name: Units
property.value: [ inches | centimeters | normalized | points | pixels | characters ]
property.description: The units of measurement for position the layout within its parent.

property.name: Visible
property.description: Is the object visible on screen.

item.name: uix.BoxPanel
item.desc: for creating a more boxy panel

item.name: uix.TabPanel
item.desc: for a panel with tabs for selecting the visible child

item.name: uix.HBox
item.desc: for creating a horizontal arrangement within a panel

subsection.name: uix.CardPanel
subsection.description: Show one element (card) from a list
subsection.p: Show one element (card) from a list

dl.dd: creates a new card panel which allows selection between the different child objects contained, making the selected child fill the space available and all other children invisible. This is commonly used for creating wizards or quick switching between different views of a single data-set.
also sets one or more property values.

property.name: BackgroundColor
property.description: The color to use for exposed areas of the layout background. This can be an RGB triple (e.g. [0 0 1]) or a colour name (e.g. 'b').

property.name: BeingDeleted
property.description: is the object in the process of being deleted.

property.name: Children
property.description: List of child objects within this layout (note that this can only be set to permutations of itself).

property.name: DeleteFcn
property.description: Function to call when the layout is being deleted

property.name: Padding
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space around the outside of the layout.

property.name: Parent
property.description: The handle of the parent figure or container.

property.name: Position
property.description: The position (x,y) and size (w,h) of the layout.

property.name: Selection
property.description: Which child is visible.

property.name: Tag
property.description: A string that can be used to identify this object later.

property.name: Type
property.description: the object type (class).

property.name: Units
property.value: [ inches | centimeters | normalized | points | pixels | characters ]
property.description: The units of measurement for position the layout within its parent.

property.name: Visible
property.description: Is the object visible on screen.

item.name: uix.Panel
item.desc: for creating a standard panel

item.name: uix.BoxPanel
item.desc: for creating a more boxy panel

item.name: uix.TabPanel
item.desc: for a panel with tabs for selecting the visible child

subsection.name: uix.BoxPanel
subsection.description: Arrange a single element in a panel with boxed title
subsection.p: Arrange a single element in a panel with boxed title

dl.dd: creates a box-styled panel object with automatic management of the contained widget or layout. The properties available are largely the same as the builtin UIPANEL object. Where more than one child is added, the currently visible child is determined using the Selection property.
also sets one or more property values.

property.name: BackgroundColor
property.description: The color to use for exposed areas of the layout background. This can be an RGB triple (e.g. [0 0 1]) or a colour name (e.g. 'b').

property.name: BeingDeleted
property.description: is the object in the process of being deleted.

property.name: BorderType
property.value: [ none | etchedin | etchedout | beveledin | beveledout | line ]
property.description: Type of border around the title and content areas.

property.name: Children
property.description: List of child objects within this layout (note that this can only be set to permutations of itself).

property.name: CloseRequestFcn
property.description: Function to call when the panel close icon is clicked. Note that if empty, no close button is shown.

property.name: DeleteFcn
property.description: Function to call when the layout is being deleted

property.name: DockFcn
property.description: Function to call when panel is docked or undocked. Note that if empty, no dock button is shown. See advanced maneuvers with panels for details.

property.name: FontAngle
property.description: Title font angle.

property.name: FontName
property.description: Title font name (e.g. Arial, Helvetica etc).

property.name: FontSize
property.description: Title font size.

property.name: FontUnits
property.description: Title font units for measuring size.

property.name: FontWeight
property.description: Title font weight.

property.name: ForegroundColor
property.description: Title font color and/or color of 2-D border line.

property.name: HelpFcn
property.description: Function to call when the help icon is clicked. Note that if empty, no help button is shown. See advanced maneuvers with panels for details.

property.name: HighlightColor
property.description: 3-D frame highlight color.

property.name: IsDocked
property.description: Is this panel in a docked state. See advanced maneuvers with panels for details.

property.name: IsMinimized
property.description: Is this panel in a minimized state. See advanced maneuvers with panels for details.

property.name: MinimizeFcn
property.description: Function to call when panel is minimized or maximized. Note that if empty, no minimize button is shown. See advanced maneuvers with panels for details.

property.name: Padding
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space around the outside of the layout.

property.name: Parent
property.description: The handle of the parent figure or container.

property.name: Position
property.description: The position (x,y) and size (w,h) of the layout.

property.name: Selection
property.description: Which child is visible.

property.name: ShadowColor
property.description: 3-D frame shadow color.

property.name: Tag
property.description: A string that can be used to identify this object later.

property.name: Title
property.description: Title string.

property.name: TitleColor
property.description: color for the title bar background.

property.name: Type
property.description: the object type (class).

property.name: Units
property.value: [ inches | centimeters | normalized | points | pixels | characters ]
property.description: The units of measurement for position the layout within its parent.

property.name: Visible
property.description: Is the object visible on screen. See the visible example for more details.

item.name: uix.Panel
item.desc: for creating a more standard panel

item.name: uix.TabPanel
item.desc: for a panel with tabs for selecting the visible child

item.name: uix.HBox
item.desc: for creating a horizontal arrangement within a panel

subsection.name: uix.TabPanel
subsection.description: Arrange elements in a panel with tabs for selecting which is visible
subsection.p: Arrange elements in a panel with tabs for selecting which is visible

dl.dd: creates a panel with tabs along one edge to allow selection between the different child objects contained.
also sets one or more property values.

property.name: BackgroundColor
property.description: The color to use for exposed areas of the layout background. This can be an RGB triple (e.g. [0 0 1]) or a colour name (e.g. 'b').

property.name: BeingDeleted
property.description: is the object in the process of being deleted.

property.name: Children
property.description: List of child objects within this layout (note that this can only be set to permutations of itself).

property.name: DeleteFcn
property.description: Function to call when the layout is being deleted

property.name: FontAngle
property.description: Title font angle.

property.name: FontName
property.description: Title font name (e.g. Arial, Helvetica etc).

property.name: FontSize
property.description: Title font size.

property.name: FontUnits
property.description: Title font units for measuring size.

property.name: FontWeight
property.description: Title font weight.

property.name: ForegroundColor
property.description: Title font color and/or color of 2-D border line.

property.name: HighlightColor
property.description: 3-D frame highlight color.

property.name: ShadowColor
property.description: 3-D frame shadow color.

property.name: IsMinimized
property.description: Is this panel in a minimized state.

property.name: MinimizeFcn
property.description: Function to call when panel is minimized or maximized.

property.name: Padding
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space around the outside of the layout.

property.name: Parent
property.description: The handle of the parent figure or container.

property.name: Position
property.description: The position (x,y) and size (w,h) of the layout.

property.name: Selection
property.description: Which child is visible.

property.name: SelectionChangedFcn
property.description: Function to call when the selected tab is changed. The event-data supplied has fields OldValue and NewValue giving the previously selected and newly selected tab indices.

property.name: TabContextMenus
property.description: The context menu (or []) for each tab.

property.name: TabEnables
property.description: A list of the enabled state of each tab (default is all 'on').

property.name: TabTitles
property.description: A list of the names of the tabs with one entry per tab.

property.name: TabWidth
property.description: Width of each tab in pixels (default 50).

property.name: Tag
property.description: A string that can be used to identify this object later.

property.name: Type
property.description: the object type (class).

property.name: Units
property.value: [ inches | centimeters | normalized | points | pixels | characters ]
property.description: The units of measurement for position the layout within its parent.

property.name: Visible
property.description: Is the object visible on screen.

item.name: uix.Panel
item.desc: for creating a more standard panel

item.name: uix.BoxPanel
item.desc: for creating a panel with boxed title

subsection.name: uix.HBox
subsection.description: Arrange elements horizontally in a single row
subsection.p: Arrange elements horizontally in a single row

dl.dd: creates a new horizontal box layout with all properties set to defaults. The output is a new layout object that can be used as the parent for other user-interface components.
also sets one or more property values.

property.name: BackgroundColor
property.description: The color to use for exposed areas of the layout background. This can be an RGB triple (e.g. [0 0 1]) or a colour name (e.g. 'b').

property.name: BeingDeleted
property.description: is the object in the process of being deleted.

property.name: Children
property.description: List of child objects within this layout (note that this can only be set to permutations of itself).

property.name: DeleteFcn
property.description: Function to call when the layout is being deleted

property.name: MinimumWidths
property.description: The minimum width in pixels for each of the child elements. The size of this vector must always match the number of elements (children).

property.name: Padding
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space around the outside of the layout.

property.name: Parent
property.description: The handle of the parent figure or container.

property.name: Position
property.description: The position (x,y) and size (w,h) of the layout.

property.name: Spacing
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space to leave between elements in the layout.

property.name: Tag
property.description: A string that can be used to identify this object later.

property.name: Type
property.description: the object type (class).

property.name: Units
property.value: [ inches | centimeters | normalized | points | pixels | characters ]
property.description: The units of measurement for position the layout within its parent.

property.name: Visible
property.description: Is the object visible on screen.

property.name: Widths
property.description: The width of each of the child elements. Positive entries indicate fixed sizes in pixels, negative values indicate relative weights for resizing. The size of this vector must always match the number of elements (children).

item.name: uix.VBox
item.desc: for creating a vertical arrangement

item.name: uix.HBoxFlex
item.desc: for creating a horizontal arrangement with draggable dividers

subsection.name: uix.VBox
subsection.description: Arrange elements vertically in a single column
subsection.p: Arrange elements vertically in a single column

dl.dd: creates a new vertical box layout with all properties set to defaults. The output is a new layout object that can be used as the parent for other user-interface components.
also sets one or more property values.

property.name: BackgroundColor
property.description: The color to use for exposed areas of the layout background. This can be an RGB triple (e.g. [0 0 1]) or a colour name (e.g. 'b').

property.name: BeingDeleted
property.description: is the object in the process of being deleted.

property.name: Children
property.description: List of child objects within this layout (note that this can only be set to permutations of itself).

property.name: DeleteFcn
property.description: Function to call when the layout is being deleted

property.name: Heights
property.description: The height of each of the child elements. Positive entries indicate fixed sizes in pixels, negative values indicate relative weights for resizing. The size of this vector must always match the number of elements (children).

property.name: MinimumHeights
property.description: The minimum height in pixels for each of the child elements. The size of this vector must always match the number of elements (children).

property.name: Padding
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space around the outside of the layout.

property.name: Parent
property.description: The handle of the parent figure or container.

property.name: Position
property.description: The position (x,y) and size (w,h) of the layout.

property.name: Spacing
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space to leave between elements in the layout.

property.name: Tag
property.description: A string that can be used to identify this object later.

property.name: Type
property.description: the object type (class).

property.name: Units
property.value: [ inches | centimeters | normalized | points | pixels | characters ]
property.description: The units of measurement for position the layout within its parent.

property.name: Visible
property.description: Is the object visible on screen.

item.name: uix.HBox
item.desc: for creating a horizontal arrangement

item.name: uix.VBoxFlex
item.desc: for creating a vertical arrangement with draggable dividers

subsection.name: uix.HBoxFlex
subsection.description: Arrange elements horizontally with draggable dividers
subsection.p: Arrange elements horizontally with draggable dividers

dl.dd: creates a new horizontal box layout with draggable dividers and with all properties set to defaults. The output is a new layout object that can be used as the parent for other user-interface components.
also sets one or more property values.

property.name: BackgroundColor
property.description: The color to use for exposed areas of the layout background. This can be an RGB triple (e.g. [0 0 1]) or a colour name (e.g. 'b').

property.name: BeingDeleted
property.description: is the object in the process of being deleted.

property.name: Children
property.description: List of child objects within this layout (note that this can only be set to permutations of itself).

property.name: DeleteFcn
property.description: Function to call when the layout is being deleted

property.name: DividerMarkings
property.description: Show markings on the draggable dividers (default 'on').

property.name: MinimumWidths
property.description: The minimum width in pixels for each of the child elements. The size of this vector must always match the number of elements (children).

property.name: Padding
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space around the outside of the layout.

property.name: Parent
property.description: The handle of the parent figure or container.

property.name: Position
property.description: The position (x,y) and size (w,h) of the layout.

property.name: Spacing
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space to leave between elements in the layout.

property.name: Tag
property.description: A string that can be used to identify this object later.

property.name: Type
property.description: the object type (class).

property.name: Units
property.value: [ inches | centimeters | normalized | points | pixels | characters ]
property.description: The units of measurement for position the layout within its parent.

property.name: Visible
property.description: Is the object visible on screen.

property.name: Widths
property.description: The width of each of the child elements. Positive entries indicate fixed sizes in pixels, negative values indicate relative weights for resizing. The size of this vector must always match the number of elements (children).

item.name: uix.HBox
item.desc: for creating a horizontal arrangement

item.name: uix.VBoxFlex
item.desc: for creating a vertical arrangement with draggable dividers

subsection.name: uix.VBoxFlex
subsection.description: Arrange elements vertically with draggable dividers
subsection.p: Arrange elements vertically with draggable dividers

dl.dd: creates a new vertical box layout with draggable dividers and with all properties set to defaults. The output is a new layout object that can be used as the parent for other user-interface components.
also sets one or more property values from the list below.

property.name: BackgroundColor
property.description: The color to use for exposed areas of the layout background. This can be an RGB triple (e.g. [0 0 1]) or a colour name (e.g. 'b').

property.name: BeingDeleted
property.description: is the object in the process of being deleted.

property.name: Children
property.description: List of child objects within this layout (note that this can only be set to permutations of itself).

property.name: DeleteFcn
property.description: Function to call when the layout is being deleted

property.name: DividerMarkings
property.description: Show markings on the draggable dividers (default 'on').

property.name: Heights
property.description: The height of each of the child elements. Positive entries indicate fixed sizes in pixels, negative values indicate relative weights for resizing. The size of this vector must always match the number of elements (children).

property.name: MinimumHeights
property.description: The minimum height in pixels for each of the child elements. The size of this vector must always match the number of elements (children).

property.name: Padding
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space around the outside of the layout.

property.name: Parent
property.description: The handle of the parent figure or container.

property.name: Position
property.description: The position (x,y) and size (w,h) of the layout.

property.name: Spacing
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space to leave between elements in the layout.

property.name: Tag
property.description: A string that can be used to identify this object later.

property.name: Type
property.description: the object type (class).

property.name: Units
property.value: [ inches | centimeters | normalized | points | pixels | characters ]
property.description: The units of measurement for position the layout within its parent.

property.name: Visible
property.description: Is the object visible on screen.

item.name: uix.VBox
item.desc: for creating a vertical arrangement

item.name: uix.HBoxFlex
item.desc: for creating a horizontal arrangement with draggable dividers

subsection.name: uix.HButtonBox
subsection.description: Arrange buttons horizontally in a single row
subsection.p: Arrange buttons horizontally in a single row

dl.dd: is a type of HBox specialised for arranging a row of buttons, check-boxes or similar graphical elements. All buttons are given equal size and by default are centered in the drawing area. The justification can be changed as required.
also sets one or more property values.

property.name: BackgroundColor
property.description: The color to use for exposed areas of the layout background. This can be an RGB triple (e.g. [0 0 1]) or a colour name (e.g. 'b').

property.name: BeingDeleted
property.description: is the object in the process of being deleted.

property.name: ButtonSize
property.description: The size for the buttons (all are given equal size).

property.name: Children
property.description: List of child objects within this layout (note that this can only be set to permutations of itself).

property.name: DeleteFcn
property.description: Function to call when the layout is being deleted

property.name: HorizontalAlignment
property.description: The horizontal position of the buttons.

property.name: Padding
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space around the outside of the layout.

property.name: Parent
property.description: The handle of the parent figure or container.

property.name: Position
property.description: The position (x,y) and size (w,h) of the layout.

property.name: Spacing
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space to leave between elements in the layout.

property.name: Tag
property.description: A string that can be used to identify this object later.

property.name: Type
property.description: the object type (class).

property.name: Units
property.value: [ inches | centimeters | normalized | points | pixels | characters ]
property.description: The units of measurement for position the layout within its parent.

property.name: VerticalAlignment
property.description: The vertical position of the buttons.

property.name: Visible
property.description: Is the object visible on screen.

item.name: uix.VButtonBox
item.desc: for creating a vertical arrangement of buttons

item.name: uix.HBox
item.desc: for creating a general horizontal arrangement

subsection.name: uix.VButtonBox
subsection.description: Arrange buttons vertically in a single column
subsection.p: Arrange buttons vertically in a single column

dl.dd: is a type of VBox specialised for arranging a column of buttons, check-boxes or similar graphical elements. All buttons are given equal size and by default are centered in the drawing area. The justification can be changed as required.
also sets one or more property values.

property.name: BackgroundColor
property.description: The color to use for exposed areas of the layout background. This can be an RGB triple (e.g. [0 0 1]) or a colour name (e.g. 'b').

property.name: BeingDeleted
property.description: is the object in the process of being deleted.

property.name: ButtonSize
property.description: The size for the buttons (all are given equal size).

property.name: Children
property.description: List of child objects within this layout (note that this can only be set to permutations of itself).

property.name: DeleteFcn
property.description: Function to call when the layout is being deleted

property.name: HorizontalAlignment
property.description: The horizontal position of the buttons.

property.name: Padding
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space around the outside of the layout.

property.name: Parent
property.description: The handle of the parent figure or container.

property.name: Position
property.description: The position (x,y) and size (w,h) of the layout.

property.name: Spacing
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space to leave between elements in the layout.

property.name: Tag
property.description: A string that can be used to identify this object later.

property.name: Type
property.description: the object type (class).

property.name: Units
property.value: [ inches | centimeters | normalized | points | pixels | characters ]
property.description: The units of measurement for position the layout within its parent.

property.name: VerticalAlignment
property.description: The vertical position of the buttons.

property.name: Visible
property.description: Is the object visible on screen.

item.name: uix.HButtonBox
item.desc: for creating a horizontal arrangement of buttons

item.name: uix.VBox
item.desc: for creating a general vertical arrangement

subsection.name: uix.Grid
subsection.description: Arrange elements in a two dimensional grid
subsection.p: Arrange elements in a two dimensional grid

dl.dd: creates a new new grid layout with all properties set to defaults. The number of rows and columns to use is determined from the number of elements in the Heights and Widths properties respectively. Child elements are arranged down column one first, then column two etc. If there are insufficient columns then a new one is added. The output is a new layout object that can be used as the parent for other user-interface components.
also sets one or more property values.

property.name: BackgroundColor
property.description: The color to use for exposed areas of the layout background. This can be an RGB triple (e.g. [0 0 1]) or a colour name (e.g. 'b').

property.name: BeingDeleted
property.description: is the object in the process of being deleted.

property.name: Children
property.description: List of child objects within this layout (note that this can only be set to permutations of itself).

property.name: DeleteFcn
property.description: Function to call when the layout is being deleted

property.name: Heights
property.description: The height of each of the rows. Positive entries indicate fixed sizes in pixels, negative values indicate relative weights for resizing.

property.name: Padding
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space around the outside of the layout.

property.name: Parent
property.description: The handle of the parent figure or container.

property.name: Position
property.description: The position (x,y) and size (w,h) of the layout.

property.name: Spacing
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space to leave between elements in the layout.

property.name: Tag
property.description: A string that can be used to identify this object later.

property.name: Type
property.description: the object type (class).

property.name: Units
property.value: [ inches | centimeters | normalized | points | pixels | characters ]
property.description: The units of measurement for position the layout within its parent.

property.name: Visible
property.description: Is the object visible on screen.

property.name: Widths
property.description: The width of each of the columns. Positive entries indicate fixed sizes in pixels, negative values indicate relative weights for resizing.

item.name: uix.GridFlex
item.desc: for creating a grid arrangement with draggable dividers

subsection.name: uix.GridFlex
subsection.description: Arrange elements in a two dimensional grid with draggable dividers
subsection.p: Arrange elements in a two dimensional grid with draggable dividers

dl.dd: creates a new new grid layout with draggable dividers between elements. The number of rows and columns to use is determined from the number of elements in the Heights and Widths properties respectively. Child elements are arranged down column one first, then column two etc. If there are insufficient columns then a new one is added. The output is a new layout object that can be used as the parent for other user-interface components.
also sets one or more property values.

property.name: BackgroundColor
property.description: The color to use for exposed areas of the layout background. This can be an RGB triple (e.g. [0 0 1]) or a colour name (e.g. 'b').

property.name: BeingDeleted
property.description: is the object in the process of being deleted.

property.name: Children
property.description: List of child objects within this layout (note that this can only be set to permutations of itself).

property.name: DeleteFcn
property.description: Function to call when the layout is being deleted

property.name: DividerMarkings
property.description: Show markings on the draggable dividers (default 'on').

property.name: Heights
property.description: The height of each of the rows. Positive entries indicate fixed sizes in pixels, negative values indicate relative weights for resizing.

property.name: Padding
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space around the outside of the layout.

property.name: Parent
property.description: The handle of the parent figure or container.

property.name: Position
property.description: The position (x,y) and size (w,h) of the layout.

property.name: Spacing
property.description: Number of pixels of extra space to leave between elements in the layout.

property.name: Tag
property.description: A string that can be used to identify this object later.

property.name: Type
property.description: the object type (class).

property.name: Units
property.value: [ inches | centimeters | normalized | points | pixels | characters ]
property.description: The units of measurement for position the layout within its parent.

property.name: Visible
property.description: Is the object visible on screen.

property.name: Widths
property.description: The width of each of the columns. Positive entries indicate fixed sizes in pixels, negative values indicate relative weights for resizing.

item.name: uix.Grid
item.desc: for creating a grid arrangement

dl.dd: creates an empty space object that can be used in layouts to add gaps between other elements.
also sets one or more property values.

property.name: BeingDeleted
property.description: is the object in the process of being deleted.

property.name: Parent
property.description: The handle of the parent figure or container.

property.name: Position
property.description: The position (x,y) and size (w,h) of the layout.

property.name: Tag
property.description: A string that can be used to identify this object later.

property.name: Type
property.description: the object type (class).

property.name: Units
property.value: [ inches | centimeters | normalized | points | pixels | characters ]
property.description: The units of measurement for position the layout within its parent.

property.name: Visible
property.description: Is the object visible on screen.

item.name: uix.HBox
item.desc: for arranging widgets horizontally

subsection.name: layoutRoot
subsection.description: Return the folder containing the GUI layout toolbox
subsection.p: returns the folder containing the GUI layout toolbox

dl.dd: returns the full path to the folder containing the GUI Layout Toolbox.
